============
 What's New
============

v1.0.5 (18. June 2017)
======================
- Wheels for Python 3.6

v1.0.4 (13. July 2016)
======================
- Linux wheels (manylinux1)

v1.0.3 (5. Nov 2015)
====================
- Python 3.5 wheels
- Release GIL during sampling
- Many minor fixes
